'''1.21.113''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on October 9, 2025, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40208685845005-Minecraft-1-21-113|title=Minecraft - 1.21.113|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=October 9, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Technical ===
* The {{cd|all_slots_empty}}, {{cd|any_slot_empty}}, and {{cd|has_equipment}} filters now support {{cd|main_hand}} as an equipment location.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.113
|226250|Hopper destroys bundle contents
|228459|Copper Golems do not drop item when right clicked
|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed a crash when using {{cd|%.<number>s}} specifier with a length longer than the multiplied string.
* Fixed a potential crash if an Actor query in script was happening during world load.
